verses.name: 2 Kings 20:14
verses.text: Then came Isaiah the prophet unto king Hezekiah, and said unto him, What said these men? and from whence came they unto thee? And Hezekiah said, They are come from a far country, even from Babylon.

verses.name: 2 Kings 20:15
verses.text: And he said, What have they seen in thine house? And Hezekiah answered, All the things that are in mine house have they seen: there is nothing among my treasures that I have not shewed them.

verses.name: 2 Kings 20:16
verses.text: And Isaiah said unto Hezekiah, Hear the word of the Lord.
